summary.para: Gets the current view mode of the current folder.

param.name: pViewMode
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to an unsigned integer that represents the current view mode. For a list of possible values see .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the current view mode of the current folder.

param.name: ViewMode
param.para: Sets the current view mode. For a list of possible values see .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Selects an item relative to the current item.

param.name: iRelative
param.para: The offset of the item to be selected in relation to the current item.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The current item is defined as the item in the view with the SVSI_SELECTIONMARK state. If there is no item with SVSI_SELECTIONMARK, the method returns S_FALSE and does nothing.

summary.para: Exposes methods that modify the view and select items in the current folder.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the interface, from which it inherits.
